channel.title: PerezHilton
channel.description: Since 2004, Hollywood's most sassy website has been delivering the juiciest celebrity gossip. The blog is The go-to source for daily happenings in Hollywood. Written by the internet's most notorious gossip columnist, Perez Hilton (Mario Lavandeira).

item.title: Emma Roberts & Evan Peters Get VERY Familiar During Dinner Outing!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: We can't even DEAL with Emma Roberts and Evan Peter's ADORABLE relationship! The pair managed to continue their display of major cuteness over the weekend while on a mini-family outing with Emma's half-sister Grace Nickels (above)! The threesome were spotted wandering around The Grove — a popular West Hollywood shopping area — before stopping at The Fat [...]
item.content:encoded:
We can't even DEAL with Emma Roberts and Evan Peter's ADORABLE relationship!

The pair managed to continue their display of major cuteness over the weekend while on a mini-family outing with Emma's half-sister Grace Nickels (above)!

The threesome were spotted wandering around The Grove -- a popular West Hollywood shopping area -- before stopping at The Fat Cow restaurant for din dins.

YUMMERS!

Emma chose a rather TASTY way of introducing her new beau to her lil' sis!

During the outing, Emma donned a super flowy, olive green dress which she covered with a motorcycle jacket, and her sis rocked a grinning skullz-patterned blouse over slim-fit jeans.

Evan looked like your typical dude in a vintage baseball-style tee, khakis, and shades.

CH-ch-check out TONS more snaps of this attractive trifecta (below)!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Patrick Schwarzenegger Gets His Bare Bod Wet On Spring Break! Completely Gratuitous!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Oooh, how we love a bare naked, glistening wet, chiseled body! And Patrick Schwarzenegger gave us all that and more! The college hottie celebrated his first college spring break just right as he took off to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico and then Miami for some beach time partying. And boy are we happy he did because that bod [...]
item.content:encoded:
Oooh, how we love a bare naked, glistening wet, chiseled body!

And Patrick Schwarzenegger gave us all that and more!

The college hottie celebrated his first college spring break just right as he took off to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico and then Miami for some beach time partying.

And boy are we happy he did because that bod just shouldn’t remain covered up in college logo sweaters.

Seriously, he could almost give our number one boyfriend, Zac Efron, a run for his money!

Who are we kidding?! NEVER!!

But at least he’s probably making daddy Arnold Schwarzenegger pretty proud with his muscle-y bod.

And we don't mind the extra eye candy!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Wiz Khalifa Has "Got To Get Stoned!" What About Being A Parent?!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: We wonder if Amber Rose still thinks her man is the "best daddy ever" NOW! While Wiz Khalifa has always enjoyed his fair share of the greenery - and pretty much straight up said a while back that the birth of his son Sebastian Taylor Thomaz would not deter his smoking - it seems a little [...]
item.content:encoded:
We wonder if Amber Rose still thinks her man is the "best daddy ever" NOW!

While Wiz Khalifa has always enjoyed his fair share of the greenery - and pretty much straight up said a while back that the birth of his son Sebastian Taylor Thomaz would not deter his smoking - it seems a little odd to us that only a month after the little guy's birth, he's posting photos of himself on Instagram taking a blunt to the face!

Ch-ch-check out the snap (above), which he captioned:

Got To Get Stoned

Yeesh!

And how does Miss Rose feel about your leaving her with the crux of the parenting responsibility while you're off getting high?

Obviously, everyone has their vice of choice with which they enjoy being able to unwind, but we just hope your love of herb - or apparent NEED to be stoned - isn't impeding on your ability to be the best possible dad you can be!

Behave yourself, Wiz!

[Image via Instagram.]

item.title: Lindsay Lohan's Assistant WILL Be Questioned For Witness Tampering!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: And the hits just keep on coming! Lindsay Lohan's assistant, Gavin Doyle, will be questioned today about allegations of witness tampering by LiLo's attorney, Mark Heller, EVEN THOUGH he already publicly called BULL SHIZ. …that is if he decides to show up to his meeting with LA City attorney, Terry White!!! Gavin already blew [...]
item.content:encoded:
And the hits just keep on coming!

Lindsay Lohan's assistant, Gavin Doyle, will be questioned today about allegations of witness tampering by LiLo's attorney, Mark Heller, EVEN THOUGH he already publicly called BULL SHIZ.

...that is if he decides to show up to his meeting with LA City attorney, Terry White!!!

Gavin already blew off a meeting with the city attorney last week regarding accusations that Mark wanted Gavin to say the PCH crash was HIS fault.

A source explained:

“The prosecutor is looking into allegations that Lohan’s attorney, Mark Heller, wanted Gavin to say that the car accident last summer, in which Lindsay was behind the wheel, was actually his fault. Heller allegedly told Gavin to say that photographers were chasing the duo en route to the Liz & Dick set, and he grabbed the steering wheel, causing her to crash into the cement truck driver. White is taking this very seriously. Heller and Doyle allegedly had the conversation in New York, and White will be turning over his findings to the New York State Bar Association, and other law enforcement, if necessary.”

That would be one CRAZY scenario if Gavin had even met Mark before court, but legal matters are still to be taken VERY seriously.

We don't think it would be a smart move to continue to mess with the head honcho of the LA law, Gavin.

Just show up so you can clear your name and Mark's and so Linds can party go to rehab in peace!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Britney Spears Tries To Keep BLING On Her Ring Finger HIDDEN During Vegas Vacation! See It HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Well, well, well! It looks to US like someone may have used the opportunity for a lovers' getaway in Las Vegas to make his burgeoning relationship with a certain pop princess even MORE official than it already clearly is…with a RING! As we've reported, our beloved Britney Spears hung out in Sin City this weekend with her [...]
item.content:encoded:
Well, well, well!

It looks to US like someone may have used the opportunity for a lovers' getaway in Las Vegas to make his burgeoning relationship with a certain pop princess even MORE official than it already clearly is...with a RING!

As we've reported, our beloved Britney Spears hung out in Sin City this weekend with her manager Larry Rudolph and new man David Lucado, strolling the strip, taking in a Cirque du Soleil show, and possibly even finalizing her deal for a residency at Planet Hollywood's PH Live venue!

But what we DIDN't immediately notice is that while gurlfriend was on her way to a dinner date at Meatball Spot at Town Square Mall, she was photographed attempting to keep her left hand tucked into her jacket...because new pictures prove that she is most CERTAINLY sporting some serious BLING on her ring finger!

Ch-ch-check it out for yourself (above)!

Could this mean our Brit Brit is ALREADY ENGAGED again?!

We mean, we KNEW these two seemed happy and are definitely spending quality time together, but it hasn't even been tree months!

But what are the alternatives?! A promise ring? Just a present?!

Maybe she just prefers decorating that finger!

Guess we'll have to wait to find out for sure...but we've got our eyes on you, gurl!

[Images via National Photo Group.]

item.title: Kate Winslet Is OFFICIALLY Cast In Divergent, But Not As Who You Might Think!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: We can finally get excited!! Kate Winslet has been rumored for months now to be cast in Divergent, and after a whole lot of teasing, it’s official! The actress will be joining an AH-Mazing cast that includes Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Jai Courtney, Zoë Kravitz, Ansel Elgort and Maggie Q. But the best part about her casting is [...]
item.content:encoded:
We can finally get excited!!

Kate Winslet has been rumored for months now to be cast in Divergent, and after a whole lot of teasing, it’s official!

The actress will be joining an AH-Mazing cast that includes Shailene Woodley, Theo James, Jai Courtney, Zoë Kravitz, Ansel Elgort and Maggie Q.

But the best part about her casting is that it’s in a totally unexpected role!

Instead of playing a heroin-type character like we would expect our sweet Kate to do, she’ll be downright villainous!

Kate has been cast as Jeanine Matthews in the film which has us just waiting on the edge of our seats to see how bada** she will be.

We must admit, we are so happy this casting rumor turned out to be true!

Now, time for the waiting game...

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Fall Out Boy's Comeback SOARS Like The Phoenix In New Single AND Music Video! Watch HERE!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Guess we're not just getting a brand new album from Fall Out Boy! We're also getting a STORY! With an over-arching narrative through each of the music videos released for their new tunes! And the latest off Save Rock and Roll is called The Phoenix, with an all-new clip that takes place before the events [...]
item.content:encoded:
Guess we're not just getting a brand new album from Fall Out Boy!

We're also getting a STORY! With an over-arching narrative through each of the music videos released for their new tunes!

And the latest off Save Rock and Roll is called The Phoenix, with an all-new clip that takes place before the events featured in My Songs Know What You Did in the Dark (Light Em Up)...and explains why Pete Wentz, Patrick Stump and the boys were kidnapped and thrown in that van!

According to a note on their official website:

“Welcome to the Prequel! Here’s the video for ‘The Phoenix’ – it tells the tale of how we ended up blindfolded in the back of the black van in the mskwyditd video. This is chapter 2 of 11. Stay tuned for chapter 3, coming to a computer, tablet, or phone near you soon.”

Oh MAN! ELEVEN videos?!

Here's hoping that Courtney Love finds her way into at least one of them, seeing as she's an EFFING guest vocalist on a new tune!

We are getting TOO excited for this! How about U guys?!

item.title: Prince Harry's Peen To Enter The United States This May… But Will It RETURN To Sin City?!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Rejoice! Our royal brother from an English mother will RETURN to the United States for the first time since his salacious Las Vegas naked picture scandal! Prince Harry will fly through our spacious skies and experience America's amber waves of grain this May, but rather than party it up with random girls in Sin City, [...]
item.content:encoded:
Rejoice!

Our royal brother from an English mother will RETURN to the United States for the first time since his salacious Las Vegas naked picture scandal!

Prince Harry will fly through our spacious skies and experience America's amber waves of grain this May, but rather than party it up with random girls in Sin City, it seems the cheeky ginger has more diplomatic plans in mind...

Like visiting areas in NY and New Jersey that were BADLY damaged by Hurricane Sandy!

The charitable Prince will also travel to Colorado Springs to attend the Warrior Games (a series of athletic events involving wounded servicemen and women), visit our nation's capital, AND will be the honored guest at a swanky affair in NYC.

To wrap up his brief visit (May 9 - May 15), Harry will participate in a polo match benefitting his charity, Sentebale.

Fun times! But probably not quite as fun as stripping off one's clothes and making out with sexy strangers...

LOLz!

[Image via WENN.]
